question: [Practice] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.

qas.question: [Practice] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.
[Rapid] Norsk: Oppgi how many samples were used in total basert pa histogrammet.
[Brief] Deutsch: Gib how many entries fall inside the modal bin anhand des Histogramms an.
